snippet.title: Autobahn Police Simulator 2 (Switch) | Official Trailer | Aerosoft
snippet.description:
COMING SOON

Start your career as a law enforcement officer on Europe's fastest roads on the go with Autobahn Police Simulator 2 for Nintendo Switch! Your adventure starts right in the police station and offers many varied missions such as high-speed chases, accident prevention and traffic controls. Various vehicles are available for your missions. In addition to the exciting story mode, there is also a free game mode in an open world.

For more news and information follow us: 
Facebook: https://www.facebook.com/AutobahnPoliceSimulator
Twitter: https://twitter.com/aerosoftgmbh 

#autobahnpolicesimulator #zsoftware #aerosoft

© 2021 AEROSOFT. All rights reserved. All trademarks and brand names are trademarks or registered trademarks of the respective owners.
